name: Gap Analysis Ontology
description: Comprehensive ontology for comparative gap analysis supporting the CGA Agent. Models gaps, threats, opportunities, recommendations, and priority matrices with full cross-ontology integration to ORG-CONTEXT, VSOM, CL, ORG-MAT, and PPM.

hasDefinedTerm.name: Gap Analysis Report
hasDefinedTerm.description: Container for a complete gap analysis including identified gaps, threats, opportunities, priority matrix, recommendations, and executive summary
hasDefinedTerm.skos:note: Central hub entity â€” all other GA entities connect through this report container

ga:properties.name: Identifier
ga:properties.description: Unique identifier for this gap analysis report

ga:properties.name: Session ID
ga:properties.description: Analysis session identifier for traceability

ga:properties.name: Analysis Type
ga:properties.description: Type of analysis: comparative, structural, competitive, capability, or content

ga:properties.name: Domain Instance
ga:properties.description: PF-Instance identifier (e.g., BAIV, AIR, W4M)

ga:properties.name: Status
ga:properties.description: Report lifecycle status: draft, reviewed, or approved

ga:properties.name: Entity Count
ga:properties.description: Number of entities analysed in this report

ga:properties.name: Relationship Count
ga:properties.description: Number of relationships analysed in this report

ga:properties.name: Timeframe
ga:properties.description: Analysis timeframe or planning horizon

ga:properties.name: Comparators
ga:properties.description: Entities or frameworks being compared in the analysis

hasDefinedTerm.name: Identified Gap
hasDefinedTerm.description: A gap identified through analysis with type classification, severity rating, confidence score, and supporting evidence linkage

ga:properties.name: Gap ID
ga:properties.description: Unique identifier for this identified gap

ga:properties.name: Gap Type
ga:properties.description: Classification: structural_hole, capability, content, competitive, market, or technology

ga:properties.name: Title
ga:properties.description: Short descriptive title for the gap

ga:properties.name: Description
ga:properties.description: Detailed description of the gap and its implications

ga:properties.name: Severity
ga:properties.description: Severity classification: critical, high, medium, or low

ga:properties.name: Confidence
ga:properties.description: Confidence score from 0 to 1 based on evidence quality

ga:properties.name: Affected Entities
ga:properties.description: List of entities affected by this gap

hasDefinedTerm.name: Gap Evidence
hasDefinedTerm.description: Supporting evidence for an identified gap including data source, metric values, collection date, and methodology used

ga:properties.name: Source
ga:properties.description: Evidence source (e.g., InfraNodus, market research, competitor audit)

ga:properties.name: Metric
ga:properties.description: Metric name used for measurement (e.g., betweenness_centrality)

ga:properties.name: Value
ga:properties.description: Measured metric value supporting the gap identification

ga:properties.name: Date Collected
ga:properties.description: When the evidence was collected

ga:properties.name: Methodology
ga:properties.description: Methodology used to collect and validate the evidence

hasDefinedTerm.name: Business Impact
hasDefinedTerm.description: Assessment of business impact from a gap including revenue risk, competitive risk, opportunity cost, and estimated financial value

ga:properties.name: Revenue Risk
ga:properties.description: Revenue impact severity: critical, high, medium, or low

ga:properties.name: Competitive Risk
ga:properties.description: Competitive position impact: critical, high, medium, or low

ga:properties.name: Opportunity Cost
ga:properties.description: Description of foregone opportunities

ga:properties.name: Estimated Value
ga:properties.description: Estimated monetary impact of the gap

ga:properties.name: Time to Impact
ga:properties.description: Estimated time before the gap causes material impact

hasDefinedTerm.name: Structural Hole
hasDefinedTerm.description: A disconnected cluster in a knowledge graph identified through network analysis, representing missing connections between concept areas

ga:properties.name: Betweenness Centrality
ga:properties.description: Network centrality score (0 to 1) indicating structural importance

ga:properties.name: Cluster Size
ga:properties.description: Number of nodes in the disconnected cluster

ga:properties.name: Disconnected Nodes
ga:properties.description: List of node identifiers in the disconnected cluster

ga:properties.name: Graph Density
ga:properties.description: Local graph density around the structural hole

hasDefinedTerm.name: Bridge Concept
hasDefinedTerm.description: A concept that could connect disconnected areas in a knowledge graph, serving as a potential resolution for structural holes

ga:properties.name: Concept Name
ga:properties.description: Name of the bridging concept

ga:properties.name: Connects Gaps
ga:properties.description: List of gap IDs this concept could bridge

ga:properties.name: Bridge Strength
ga:properties.description: Estimated strength of the bridge (0 to 1)

ga:properties.name: Implementation Complexity
ga:properties.description: Complexity to implement: low, medium, or high

ga:properties.name: Related Concepts
ga:properties.description: Other concepts related to this bridge

hasDefinedTerm.name: Threat Assessment
hasDefinedTerm.description: Assessment of a competitive or market threat derived from identified gaps, with probability, impact, and calculated risk score

ga:properties.name: Threat ID
ga:properties.description: Unique identifier for this threat

ga:properties.name: Threat Type
ga:properties.description: Classification: competitive, market, capability, technology, or regulatory

ga:properties.name: Description
ga:properties.description: Detailed description of the threat and its context

ga:properties.name: Probability
ga:properties.description: Probability of threat materialising (0 to 1)

ga:properties.name: Impact
ga:properties.description: Severity of impact if threat materialises (0 to 1)

ga:properties.name: Risk Score
ga:properties.description: Calculated as probability * impact (0 to 1)

ga:properties.name: Time Horizon
ga:properties.description: Expected timeframe: immediate, short-term, medium-term, or long-term

hasDefinedTerm.name: Mitigation Option
hasDefinedTerm.description: A potential mitigation strategy for a threat including effort estimation, effectiveness rating, cost, and implementation timeline

ga:properties.name: Option
ga:properties.description: Description of the mitigation strategy

ga:properties.name: Effort
ga:properties.description: Estimated implementation effort: low, medium, or high

ga:properties.name: Effectiveness
ga:properties.description: Estimated effectiveness of the mitigation (0 to 1)

ga:properties.name: Cost
ga:properties.description: Estimated monetary cost of implementing the mitigation

ga:properties.name: Time to Implement
ga:properties.description: Estimated implementation timeline

hasDefinedTerm.name: Opportunity Assessment
hasDefinedTerm.description: Assessment of a strategic opportunity derived from gap analysis with feasibility scoring, time-to-value estimation, and required capabilities

ga:properties.name: Opportunity ID
ga:properties.description: Unique identifier for this opportunity

ga:properties.name: Opportunity Type
ga:properties.description: Classification: market, capability, content, partnership, technology, or innovation

ga:properties.name: Title
ga:properties.description: Short descriptive title for the opportunity

ga:properties.name: Description
ga:properties.description: Detailed description of the opportunity and its value

ga:properties.name: Feasibility
ga:properties.description: Feasibility score from 0 to 1

ga:properties.name: Time to Value
ga:properties.description: Estimated time to realise value from this opportunity

ga:properties.name: Required Capabilities
ga:properties.description: Capabilities needed to pursue this opportunity

hasDefinedTerm.name: Potential Value
hasDefinedTerm.description: Estimated value of an opportunity including revenue impact, market share gain, competitive advantage, and strategic value rating

ga:properties.name: Revenue Impact
ga:properties.description: Estimated revenue impact of pursuing this opportunity

ga:properties.name: Market Share Gain
ga:properties.description: Estimated market share improvement

ga:properties.name: Competitive Advantage
ga:properties.description: Description of competitive advantage gained

ga:properties.name: Strategic Value
ga:properties.description: Strategic value rating: critical, high, medium, or low

ga:properties.name: Confidence Level
ga:properties.description: Confidence in value estimate (0 to 1)

hasDefinedTerm.name: Priority Matrix
hasDefinedTerm.description: Impact/effort prioritisation matrix with weighted dimensions and quadrants for systematic gap and opportunity ranking

ga:properties.name: Dimensions
ga:properties.description: Scoring dimensions: impact, effort, urgency, alignment

ga:properties.name: Weight Impact
ga:properties.description: Weight for impact dimension (default 0.4)

ga:properties.name: Weight Effort
ga:properties.description: Weight for effort dimension (default 0.3)

ga:properties.name: Weight Urgency
ga:properties.description: Weight for urgency dimension (default 0.15)

ga:properties.name: Weight Alignment
ga:properties.description: Weight for strategic alignment dimension (default 0.15)

hasDefinedTerm.name: Priority Quadrant
hasDefinedTerm.description: A quadrant in the priority matrix categorising items as Quick Wins, Major Projects, Fill-Ins, or Hard Slogs based on impact and effort

ga:properties.name: Quadrant Type
ga:properties.description: Quadrant classification: quickWins, majorProjects, fillIns, or hardSlogs

ga:properties.name: Impact Level
ga:properties.description: Impact axis: high or low

ga:properties.name: Effort Level
ga:properties.description: Effort axis: high or low

ga:properties.name: Item Count
ga:properties.description: Number of ranked items in this quadrant

hasDefinedTerm.name: Ranked Item
hasDefinedTerm.description: An item ranked within the priority matrix with composite score, rank position, item type classification, and prioritisation rationale

ga:properties.name: Item ID
ga:properties.description: Reference to the gap, threat, or opportunity being ranked

ga:properties.name: Item Type
ga:properties.description: Type of ranked item: gap, threat, or opportunity

ga:properties.name: Rank
ga:properties.description: Priority rank position (1 = highest)

ga:properties.name: Composite Score
ga:properties.description: Weighted composite priority score (0 to 1)

ga:properties.name: Rationale
ga:properties.description: Reasoning behind the priority ranking

hasDefinedTerm.name: Recommendation
hasDefinedTerm.description: Actionable recommendation derived from gap analysis with implementation phases, expected outcomes, and strategic alignment to VSOM objectives

ga:properties.name: Recommendation ID
ga:properties.description: Unique identifier for this recommendation

ga:properties.name: Title
ga:properties.description: Short descriptive title for the recommendation

ga:properties.name: Description
ga:properties.description: Detailed description of the recommended action

ga:properties.name: Action Type
ga:properties.description: Type: content, capability, process, partnership, or technology

ga:properties.name: Priority
ga:properties.description: Priority level: critical, high, medium, or low

ga:properties.name: Estimated Effort
ga:properties.description: Estimated effort for implementation

ga:properties.name: Dependencies
ga:properties.description: Other recommendations or conditions this depends on

ga:properties.name: Risks
ga:properties.description: Implementation risks for this recommendation

hasDefinedTerm.name: Implementation Phase
hasDefinedTerm.description: A phase in the recommendation implementation plan with deliverables, effort estimate, and prerequisite conditions

ga:properties.name: Phase
ga:properties.description: Phase sequence number

ga:properties.name: Phase Name
ga:properties.description: Descriptive name for this implementation phase

ga:properties.name: Deliverables
ga:properties.description: Expected deliverables from this phase

ga:properties.name: Estimated Effort
ga:properties.description: Estimated effort for this phase

ga:properties.name: Prerequisites
ga:properties.description: Conditions that must be met before starting this phase

hasDefinedTerm.name: Expected Outcome
hasDefinedTerm.description: Expected outcomes from implementing a recommendation including gaps closed, threats addressed, opportunities enabled, and value created

ga:properties.name: Gaps Closed
ga:properties.description: List of gap IDs addressed by this outcome

ga:properties.name: Threats Addressed
ga:properties.description: List of threat IDs mitigated by this outcome

ga:properties.name: Opportunities Enabled
ga:properties.description: List of opportunity IDs enabled by this outcome

ga:properties.name: Value Created
ga:properties.description: Description of value created by achieving this outcome

hasDefinedTerm.name: Outcome Metric
hasDefinedTerm.description: A metric for measuring recommendation outcomes with baseline value, target value, measurement unit, and frequency

ga:properties.name: Metric Name
ga:properties.description: Name of the measurement metric

ga:properties.name: Baseline
ga:properties.description: Current baseline value for this metric

ga:properties.name: Target
ga:properties.description: Target value to achieve for this metric

ga:properties.name: Unit
ga:properties.description: Unit of measurement for this metric

ga:properties.name: Measurement Frequency
ga:properties.description: How often the metric should be measured

hasDefinedTerm.name: Executive Summary
hasDefinedTerm.description: High-level summary of gap analysis findings and recommendations for stakeholder communication and decision-making

ga:properties.name: Key Findings
ga:properties.description: List of critical findings from the analysis

ga:properties.name: Critical Gaps Count
ga:properties.description: Number of gaps rated as critical severity

ga:properties.name: High Priority Opportunities
ga:properties.description: Number of high-priority opportunities identified

ga:properties.name: Total Threats
ga:properties.description: Total number of threats identified

ga:properties.name: Recommended Next Steps
ga:properties.description: Prioritised list of immediate next steps

ga:properties.name: Estimated Total Value
ga:properties.description: Estimated total monetary value across all opportunities

relationships.name: identifiesGap
relationships.description: A GapAnalysisReport identifies one or more gaps through its analysis process

relationships.name: hasEvidence
relationships.description: An IdentifiedGap is supported by one or more GapEvidence records

relationships.name: hasBusinessImpact
relationships.description: An IdentifiedGap has a BusinessImpact assessment quantifying its consequences

relationships.name: specialisedAsStructuralHole
relationships.description: An IdentifiedGap may be further classified as a StructuralHole when it involves graph disconnection

relationships.name: hasBridgeConcept
relationships.description: A StructuralHole has one or more potential BridgeConcepts that could resolve the disconnection

relationships.name: identifiesThreat
relationships.description: A GapAnalysisReport identifies one or more ThreatAssessments from its findings

relationships.name: threatRelatedToGap
relationships.description: A ThreatAssessment is derived from one or more IdentifiedGaps

relationships.name: hasMitigation
relationships.description: A ThreatAssessment has one or more potential MitigationOptions

relationships.name: identifiesOpportunity
relationships.description: A GapAnalysisReport identifies one or more strategic OpportunityAssessments

relationships.name: opportunityRelatedToGap
relationships.description: An OpportunityAssessment is derived from one or more IdentifiedGaps

relationships.name: hasPotentialValue
relationships.description: An OpportunityAssessment has a PotentialValue estimation quantifying its worth

relationships.name: enabledByBridge
relationships.description: An OpportunityAssessment may be enabled by one or more BridgeConcepts

relationships.name: hasPriorityMatrix
relationships.description: A GapAnalysisReport has one PriorityMatrix for systematic prioritisation

relationships.name: hasQuadrant
relationships.description: A PriorityMatrix is divided into PriorityQuadrants for impact/effort classification

relationships.name: containsItem
relationships.description: A PriorityQuadrant contains one or more RankedItems positioned by their scores

relationships.name: hasRecommendation
relationships.description: A GapAnalysisReport produces one or more actionable Recommendations

relationships.name: addressesGap
relationships.description: A Recommendation directly addresses one or more IdentifiedGaps

relationships.name: addressesThreat
relationships.description: A Recommendation addresses one or more ThreatAssessments

relationships.name: enablesOpportunity
relationships.description: A Recommendation enables one or more OpportunityAssessments to be pursued

relationships.name: hasImplementationPhase
relationships.description: A Recommendation has one or more ImplementationPhases defining its execution plan

relationships.name: hasExpectedOutcome
relationships.description: A Recommendation has one or more ExpectedOutcomes defining its success criteria

relationships.name: hasOutcomeMetric
relationships.description: An ExpectedOutcome is measured by one or more OutcomeMetrics

relationships.name: hasExecutiveSummary
relationships.description: A GapAnalysisReport has one ExecutiveSummary for stakeholder communication

relationships.name: hasGapAnalysis
relationships.description: An ORG-CONTEXT OrganizationContext has gap analysis reports through the analysis bridge

relationships.name: strategicContext
relationships.description: A GapAnalysisReport is aligned to a VSOM strategic framework for strategic context

relationships.name: analysesLandscape
relationships.description: A GapAnalysisReport analyses the competitive landscape from the CL ontology

relationships.name: affectsMaturity
relationships.description: An IdentifiedGap affects maturity dimension scores in the ORG-MAT ontology

relationships.name: alignsToObjective
relationships.description: A Recommendation aligns to VSOM strategic objectives for traceability

relationships.name: spawnsProject
relationships.description: A Recommendation spawns a PPM Project when approved for implementation

relationships.name: inSegment
relationships.description: An OpportunityAssessment targets a specific CL MarketSegment

relationships.name: involvedCompetitor
relationships.description: A ThreatAssessment involves a specific competitor from the CL ontology

businessRules.name: GapEvidenceRequired
businessRules.description: Every identified gap must have at least one evidence source for credibility

businessRules.name: ThreatRiskScoreCalculation
businessRules.description: Threat risk score must equal probability multiplied by impact for consistency
businessRules.condition: IF ga:ThreatAssessment.probability AND ga:ThreatAssessment.impact ARE SET
businessRules.action: THEN ga:riskScore MUST EQUAL probability * impact

businessRules.name: LowConfidenceEscalation
businessRules.description: Gaps with confidence below 0.6 require human review before actioning
businessRules.action: THEN flag for human review with escalation note

businessRules.name: RecommendationLinkageRequired
businessRules.description: Recommendations must link to at least one gap, threat, or opportunity for traceability
businessRules.action: THEN at least one of addressesGap, addressesThreat, or enablesOpportunity MUST exist

businessRules.name: MinimumComparativeEntities
businessRules.description: Comparative analysis requires at least 3 entities to be meaningful

businessRules.name: PriorityMatrixWeightsSum
businessRules.description: Priority matrix dimension weights must sum to 1.0 for valid scoring

businessRules.name: StrategicAlignmentForHighPriority
businessRules.description: Critical and high priority recommendations should have strategic alignment to VSOM objectives

businessRules.name: ExecutiveSummaryCompleteness
businessRules.description: Executive summary must have key findings and recommended next steps
businessRules.action: THEN keyFindings AND recommendedNextSteps MUST have at least one item each

crossOntologyReferences.description: GA is a Competitive-series analysis ontology bridging strategy to execution. It receives context from ORG-CONTEXT, aligns to VSOM strategic frameworks, analyses CL competitive landscapes, measures against ORG-MAT maturity, and spawns PPM projects from recommendations.

lineageAlignment.org-ctx:OrganizationContext: ORG-CONTEXT provides the organizational context that scopes gap analysis
lineageAlignment.vsom:VSOMFramework: VSOM provides strategic framework alignment for gap analysis findings
lineageAlignment.vsom:ObjectivesComponent: VSOM objectives provide strategic alignment targets for recommendations
lineageAlignment.cl:CompetitiveLandscape: CL provides the competitive landscape context for competitive gap analysis
lineageAlignment.cl:MarketSegment: CL market segments scope opportunities identified in gap analysis
lineageAlignment.cl:CompetitorProfile: CL competitor profiles inform threat assessments
lineageAlignment.org-mat:DimensionScore: ORG-MAT maturity dimensions are affected by identified gaps
lineageAlignment.ppm:Project: PPM projects are spawned from actioned recommendations
